title: Democrats Blast Trump Over White Supremacist Attacks | Michael Bennet & Natasha Lyonne
itunes:title: Democrats Blast Trump Over White Supremacist Attacks | Michael Bennet & Natasha Lyonne
description:
Democrats slam President Trump in the wake of white supremacist gun violence, Sen. Michael Bennet discusses his White House bid, and Natasha Lyonne chats about "Russian Doll."
